newsitem.title: FRANCE: TENNIS-NOAH NAMED FRENCH FED CUP CAPTAIN.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-NOAH NAMED FRENCH FED CUP CAPTAIN.

text.p: French Davis Cup captain Yannick Noah is to take over the country's women's Fed Cup team in 1997, the French Tennis Federation announced on Saturday.
Noah, who led France to Davis Cup triumphs twice in 1991 and last year, replaces former French Open champion Francoise Durr.

The appointment followed an appeal by Fed Cup team members Mary Pierce, Julie Halard, Nathalie Tauziat and Sandrine Testud to Noah to help them win the event after reaching the semifinals three times in succession.
